---
title: ""
---





### Pacotes


::: {.cell hash='ec50_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_53dd3f5c2617e5400d07acd28d7e018b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
library(drc)
library(ec50estimator)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```
:::


### Importando dados


::: {.cell hash='ec50_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_c3deb0a254a19545d12c323c2ffbca9b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
pyra <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=465348652")
```
:::


### visualizando


::: {.cell hash='ec50_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a79c2be4969feb90f7fb927a21099337'}

```{.r .cell-code}
pyra2 <- pyra |>
  group_by(code, state, dose) |> 
  summarise(mean_germination = mean(germination))

pyra2|> 
  ggplot(aes(dose, mean_germination))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~code)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ec50_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### EC50 usando pacote (drc)


::: {.cell hash='ec50_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_91216ae261a8143c7adc30227446d765'}

```{.r .cell-code}
isolado186 <- pyra2 |> 
   filter(code == "186")

drc1 <- drm(mean_germination ~ dose, data = isolado186,
            fct = W1.3())

ED(drc1, 50, interval = "delta")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Estimated effective doses

       Estimate Std. Error    Lower    Upper
e:1:50 0.612064   0.015429 0.562963 0.661165
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='ec50_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_d2c01c9ed608364a0d3d449dce3205a3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
isolado165 <- pyra2 |> 
  filter(code == "165")

drc2 <- drm(mean_germination ~ dose, data = isolado165,
            fct = LL.3())
ED(drc2, 50, interval = "delta")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Estimated effective doses

       Estimate Std. Error   Lower   Upper
e:1:50  0.55840    0.11420 0.19498 0.92182
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='ec50_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_26d244f3f35b451eab8a1661b0771a59'}

```{.r .cell-code}
df_ec50 <- estimate_EC50(mean_germination ~ dose,
                         data = pyra2,
                         isolate_col = "code",
                         interval = "delta",
                         fct = drc::LL.3())

df_ec50 |> 
  ggplot(aes(reorder(ID, Estimate), Estimate))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = Lower, ymax = Upper), width = 0.1)+
  coord_flip()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ec50_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(df_ec50)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
